HowRetainiWorks.description: Retaini allows satisfied customers to become part of your business growth â€“ quickly and easily.

1.title: Adding a Customer
1.description: Simply add a customer â€“ provide their name and email address. Retaini will generate two QR codes: one for sharing with friends and another for customer identification. This person becomes your loyal customer and receives a welcome email with instructions.

2.title: Customer Shares, New Client Arrives
2.description: The loyal customer shares their personal QR code or link with a friend. When the new customer arrives and shows this code, you simply scan it. The system automatically identifies which loyal customer shared the code and displays what the new customer receives based on your set gift plan.

3.title: Customer Reaches a Reward
3.description: When a loyal customer reaches the set number of referred people, the system automatically adds them to the reward waiting list. This will be clearly visible on the main dashboard. At the same time, the customer receives a congratulatory email with a reminder about their pending reward.

4.title: Loyal Customer Returns
